metadata.title: Lambswool Women Oversized Large Scarf Shawl White Cream Winter Camp Blanket
features: USPTO REGISTERED TRADEMARKED BRAND. Authentic Handmade Tribe Azure Fair Trade Shawl Wrap Made from a mix of softest lamb wool yarn, cotton yarn & other recycled yarn by wonderful hill tribe artisans.
Finest Soft, Lightweight & wonderfully warm for chilly winter nights
Large: 82 inches by 40 inches With 3 inches Fringe on top and bottom
Care Instructions: Hand Wash or Cold Wash. Hang to Dry. Also Dry Cleanable
description: Hand loomed with orange black and grey geometric patterns. Finished by hand with a flirty fringe on both top and bottom. Lightweight, and soft, yet will keep you very warm on those chilly winter nights.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "10.79 x 8.7 x 2.52 inches; 15.31 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "August 2, 2016"}
